üõ†Ô∏è Free DIY Install

Run your own AI chat bot locally. 100% private. 100% yours. Follow these steps:

1. Download Oobabooga Web UI

Clone or download the web UI from the official repo:
Oobabooga GitHub

Follow the README to install Python and required packages (like torch).

2. Download the Model (GGUF Format)

We recommend: writing-roleplay-20k-context-nemo-12b-v1.0-gguf
Available here: Hugging Face

Choose a version like Q4_K_M or Q5 depending on your GPU and RAM capacity.

3. Place Model in GGUF Folder

Move the downloaded .gguf file to:
text-generation-webui/models/
You can create a folder inside for organization if needed.

4. Launch the Web UI

Open a terminal in the Oobabooga folder and run:

python server.py --model your-folder-name

Wait for it to load, then open http://localhost:7860 in your browser.

5. Start Chatting

You‚Äôre all set. The bot runs completely offline with full erotic roleplay support.
No filters. No cloud. No limits.

Optional: Enable Extensions

Try adding features like long term memory, long-form generation, or character cards using Oobabooga extensions.
See the Extensions tab in the UI for options. (Guide coming soon)

Problems?

If something breaks, ask for help in the GitHub Discussions tab or check back here soon ‚Äî we‚Äôre building a troubleshooting section.
Or just grab the $5 one-click installer and be done.
